name: demo
description: To run: + clone this repo + cd into it + run `npm install` + Add your Firebase credentials to `javascripts/fb-getter.js` then add `javascripts/fb-getter.js` to your .gitignore + Run Grunt to compile the CSS and JS files + You'll need to add all the logic for getting, adding, editing, and deleting songs to `main.js` and `db-interactions.js` + You'll need to add authentication logic to `user.js` + Can you become a Firebase Ninja Unicorn? Yup.
